byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

abstract: Donald Trump spends most of news conference he called to answer questions about his fund-raising for military veterans instead attacking journalists who have covered his presidential campaign; comments display level of vitriol rarely seen from major political figure.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump angrily listed veterans’ groups that he said had received $5.6 million in gifts and demanded that journalists credit his act of charity.

headline.main: Donald Trump Lashes Out at Media While Detailing Gifts to Veterans
headline.print_headline: Trump Vilifies Media Asking About Veterans

snippet: Mr. Trump angrily listed veterans’ groups that he said had received $5.6 million in gifts and demanded that journalists credit his act of charity.
